    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CollectionImageFactory
    CollectionImage.getImageFactory()
    If this CollectionImage was created by a CollectionImageFactory then return a reference to that factory; otherwise return null.

    CIFRegistry.get(OperationRegistry registry, String operationName)

    Method
    Description
